reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these belts and buckles!
reviews.reviewText: These belts are so easy to use, they always fit and look great!I was with a friend who had a difficult time finding belts to fit. I took mine off and gave it to him. Because this belt is adjustable as you put it on, I knew he would be able to wear it. He loved it also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks well made
reviews.reviewText: These belts were ordered for my husband. He has only worn one of them a few times, but I went ahead and gave a 5-star rating because they do look well made. They are stitched around the edges; not glued like the last adjustable belt he purchased. The only complaint I have heard from him is that the buckle, which is smaller than what was on the other belts I just mentioned, is hard to for him to operate. But this may be because of his 85-year-old hands. Sizing for this belt is perfect because it can be made to fit by cutting off extra belt at the buckle end of the belt. He likes this type of belt because it can be adjusted to suit him. He does not like very much extra belt exposed at the belt end protruding from under pant loops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ability to customize size is the biggest bonus here. Note these are not leather but still look great. Love the simple latch too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hubby likes them
reviews.reviewText: My hubby will only wear the ratchet belts. I found these to be durable and reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tactical but fashionable!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new set of "Tactical" belts as one of my previously purchased one's finally bit the dust as the mechanism wore out from me hanging tools all over it. These two belts are an absolutely great replacement, and are two for the price of one! I much prefer tactical belts as they have an easy close-open mechanism and stay tight for ages, unlike fancier, more expensive full-leather belts. You can hang some serious tools off of this bad boy and absolutely nothing will happen to it, strong like the guys who wear them!Not only are they great for manual labor, but they're great for in-office work as well! They are very subtle and blend in with the great majority of business casual options, leaving you so many ways to match these belts with various slacks, or jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beet belt ever!!!
reviews.reviewText: Belt is beautiful and easy to use very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware if you wear on a hot day
reviews.reviewText: Got these belts. Thought they were nice until I wore them on a hot day playing golf. The black color bled dye into my nice golf shirt and virtually ruined it. Tried to get the stain out with little luck. Do not wear during active activity on a hot day. Buyer beware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best belts I've ever owned!
reviews.reviewText: Sure easy to use and very comfortable
